Posts.Content: Thank you so much Constantine. Good info to know. ðŸ’œ
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose

Posts.Content: Waldebet, you are so sweet to think of me! That's why I love this site. Just saw my onc. No new lesions and reduction of activity on existing ones. As usual, I had prepared for the worst, so you could have knocked me over with a feather! The labs not so good. Still great liver function numbers but neutropenic again. Now I'll do just one verzenio every other day instead of two. AND my very reliable CEA tumor marker dropped another 15 points in a month, a total of 30 points in two months. I'm hoping verzenio gives me a good run. Hope you are well...ðŸ’œ
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose

Posts.Content: Hi Yechi Have you already done xeloda and afinitor, other orals?
Posts.Title: Anyone experience progression in breast

Posts.Content: Suzie I too worry about his ALL THE TIME. if you're ready, here goes the answer to your question: After ibrance I did 2 months afinitor, progression. 4 pacitaxel IVs, progression. Iexmpra, 16 IVs over 10 months, progression. Now verzenio, reduced dose from 150 to 100 to 50 with faslodex. As you can see, I've been through the wringer. And that's having done xeloda and halaven prior to ibrance. I need a new drug to get approved for my genetic composition! Hope this info helps. ðŸ’œ
Posts.Title: Doctor is proposing a dose reduction of Ibrance...advice

Posts.Content: I also needed a dose reduction quickly, down to 75 mg. Along wiith faslodex, it was successful for 1.5 years. Don't worrytoomuch...ðŸ’š
Posts.Title: Doctor is proposing a dose reduction of Ibrance...advice

Posts.Content: Insure I'm with you. Not just the comments, but people who disappear from your life. And don't get me started on the pity looks....immediate family and very few friends know. Although, I have to say, I recently told a good friend and it was liberating. ðŸ’œ
Posts.Title: Shocking Things People Say To Breast Cancer Patients and How I Coped

Posts.Content: At first I was thinking about my plight every second of every day and driving myself crazy. This site saved my life. After almost 8 years with liver mets....really, I'm not kidding, 8 years...woo hoo... i now wake up every day and while still in bed say out loud "today I am going to be happy". It helps get me in the right frame of mind. I also walk the beach with my dog every day and although I am not religious, I open my arms to the sky and say out loud "thank you for another day"....I guess I'm thanking the universe...lol...I was fortunate to get to meet two women on this site. That was great...i also read a lot, tell no one I have cancer and live life like it isn't happening. I take my meds, but try not to dwell on it all. So hard.... The best to you. ðŸ’œ
Posts.Title: Depression and breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks Anne. I'm one of those trying verzenio after previous ibrance use 1.5 yrs ago. We'll see. âœŒ
Posts.Title: ASCO 2019 MBC Information

Posts.Content: I began Verzenio at 150 mg then had to switch to 100 mg because if low neutrophils. Now om at 50 mg. Tomorrow's PET and labs will determine how that's working.
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose

Posts.Content: Another note in response to SE. Sometimes a little crampy and a dash to the bathroom but not bad. And I have eyelashes and hair growing again...and have to shave legs....darn....so you shouldn't lose your hair. ðŸ’š
Posts.Title: Verzenio minimum effective dose

Posts.Content: I did xeloda with exemestane, both orals, and had success for over a year. Then afinitor which didn't work at all After IV chemos and a couple year time lapse from ibrance, i am now on the oral verzenio with faslodex. So far good results and easy on me.ðŸ’œ

Posts.Content: Agreed. This is not a common enough disease to be pushing ibrance and now verzenio...weird, if you ask me.
